timeline.message:
CORE: Handle members.status as integer

- Converted members.status column to integer and bumped
  DB version, updated changelogs.
- Pass integer value to the SQL working with members.status.
- Fixed tests.

timeline.message:
CORE: Do not cast to integer if column already is an integer

- Removed obsolete construct to cast members.status column
  to integer, since the column is now already an integer.
- Aligned Status class content (no logical change).
